Name: Chen Jinsong
Text: 2.15 Battle Score System Usage
SS rank maintained. Trial rating increased.
SSS rank maintained. Trial rating increased.
SSS+ rank maintained. Trial rating increased.

Name: Hanying
Text: This is... Veronica's dream? It seems to be rejecting outsiders subconsciously.

Name: Hanying
Text: This data might bring me deeper into her mind, but the resistance will also become stronger.

Name: Hanying
Text: Perhaps there are more dream shards here. I should explore this place.

Name: Hanying
Text: Is this... SDC-39? The kin of... the last Hanged Man?

Name: SDC-39
Text: Space—far away from wars and the Punishing Virus. The magnetic accelerator rail was built because of this dream.

Name: SDC-39
Text: "The bridge to heaven." Is this why it's called Bifrost...?

Name: SDC-39
Text: When it's fixed, mechanoids and humans will be able to travel to the stars together...

Name: SDC-39
Text: I look forward to that day.

Name: Hanying
Text: No! I must have triggered the defense mechanism here!

Name: Hanying
Text: If I probe further, the dream's resistance will grow even stronger. But I can't stop here.

Name: SDC-39
Text: They said I needed to shut down for a while due to some problems in my programming, but with the ravage of Punishing, humanity is still in danger.

Name: SDC-39
Text: But with the ravage of Punishing, humanity is still in danger.

Name: SDC-39
Text: I can't wait anymore... I must finish repairing Bifrost as soon as possible...

Name: Veronica
Text: I don't understand... Why do humans deserve your sacrifice?

Name: Hanying
Text: Something strange is happening here... Is it because of SDC-39's glitches?

Name: Data Surge
Text: Getting close to the core of the dream. It's only going to be even more dangerous there... Still, I must find the source of all this strangeness.

Name: Data Figure
Text: Why would mechanoids store messages humans can understand in their memory? Is it meant for humans to read?

Name: Data Figure
Text: A mechanoid with such thoughts must be destroyed. We have plenty more, so it doesn't matter if we lose this one.

Name: Data Figure
Text: WARNING: Unknown intruder detected. Initiating virus elimination protocol—

Name: SDC-39
Text: Something made me very happy today. At a place far from here, I got to meet some mechanoid friends from the Church of Machina.

Name: SDC-39
Text: They even gave me a name, "The Hanged Man". I really like it, even though I don't understand what it means.

Name: SDC-39
Text: If we're lucky, we might even welcome someone new. Her name is Veronica. We ought to be friends with her.

Name: Veronica
Text: ...I wish I had made it in time.

Name: SDC-39
Text: I need to do a routine inspection. They said that other mechanoids wouldn't have to do it if I did.

Name: SDC-39
Text: It's okay. Perhaps my program errors will be fixed afterward.

Name: SDC-39
Text: But the Bifrost isn't done. When you reach the stars with humans, don't forget to send a photo back to Earth.

Name: SDC-39
Text: Me? Maybe I can't come with you...

Name: Veronica
Text: Don't go, 39.

Name: Hanying
Text: SDC-39... Is this how the last Hanged Man died? Protecting other mechanoids... while perishing at the hands of humans.

Name: Hanying
Text: If this is why Veronica is angry with humans...
Hah, the human-loving traitor...

Name: Data Figure
Text: Lock onto the virus source. Destroy, destroy, destroy—

Name: Hanying
Text: The dream is rejecting me again!

Name: Hanying
Text: That's...!

Name: Hanying
Text: ...! I knew it. Someone was behind that strangeness I felt!

Name: Hanying
Text: The data hasn't stopped increasing. Is this... as far as I go?

Name: Hanying
Text: Finally made it. This is where Commandant was trapped.

Name: Hanying
Text: This feels familiar... Right, I've been here in Veronica's "dream". Is the power still down...? It's so dark here.

Name: Hanying
Text: Commandant and Liv are definitely here.

Name: Hanying
Text: Alright, hurry up and get to the commandant.

Name: Hanying
Text: Commandant, Liv! Are you okay?

Name: Hanying
Text: Commandant, Liv! Are you okay?

Name: Liv
Text: Hanying? Thank you for your help. There are still quite a few guards around here. Let's fight together.

Name: Liv
Text: Hanying? We've been trapped for a while now... Thank you for your help. We'll...

Name: Hanying
Text: Don't overexert yourself, Liv. Leave it to me!

Name: Hanying
Text: Commandant, Liv... This place has so much abnormal data... I even found Hyperreal's frame data here.

Name: Liv
Text: Lee? What's going on here, Hanying?

Name: Hanying
Text: Someone is after Hyperreal's power and is likely trying to replicate his data. It's a long story. Let's get out of here first.

Name: Liv
Text: It will be safer if we stick together. Commandant, let's go with Hanying.

Name: Hanying
Text: Liv, since your frame is more damaged, focus on ensuring your safety and Commandant's... Leave the rest to me.

Name: Liv
Text: Okay... Please be careful and don't get yourself hurt.

Name: Hanying
Text: (Breathy sound)
Hmph...
Hahaha, even though I didn't manage to replicate all the data, this power is strong enough!

Name: Hanying
Text: Commandant, he copied Lee's data. He's not Lee!

Name: Broadcast
Text: Anomaly detected in the cargo area. Unable to connect with other areas—

Name: Lucia
Text: I gotta figure out where things went wrong... before Constellia gets flooded!

Name: Cradle
Text: Great to see you again, Lucia. I see you're doing a treasure hunt?

Name: Lucia
Text: This isn't the only place the Red Tide is coming out of... She really is trying to flood this city.

Name: Cradle
Text: Making headway there? Found where things went wrong? Are you able to fix those cracks even if you find them?

Name: Cradle
Text: Or, do you plan on asking your commdandant to beg Chaos, whom you hate the most, for help?

Name: Lucia
Text: This door is locked, but there should be a control panel nearby.

Name: Lucia
Text: The door is unlocked. I need to stop Cradle from strengthening the Red Tide.

Name: Cradle
Text: Say, I can make the Red Tide go away a little, but you'll have to either catch Chaos for me or lure her to where I want you to.

Name: Lucia
Text: I refuse. Whether it's you, Chaos, or that agent, I'm not letting any one of you off the hook.

Name: Cradle
Text: Sure. Go ahead and kill me here, but of course, do keep in mind that we're still in the Hetero Tower's range of influence here.

Name: Cradle
Text: You can kill me as many times as you want, but I'll never really die.

Name: Lucia
Text: So this is the way out of the Fog... No, it's similar to the Hetero Tower in terms of nature and function, except it's more like a "bridge" in comparison with the Hetero Tower.

Name: "Shadows" of the Past
Text: This is the rule we set. This is our safety zone. These... our wills... are the only things we were able to leave you with.

Name: "Shadows" of the Past
Text: Nemo, leave this world. Find a way to completely eliminate Agent Zero.

Name: "Shadows" of the Past
Text: Do me a favor—save that world that has yet to be destroyed, save those who still wish to live.

Name: "Shadows" of the Past
Text: Forget about us, don't try to save us, and don't waste your chance to turn back time on us.

Name: Lucia
Text: Their rules still protect this place. I'm sorry, but I must pass through.

Name: Lucia
Text: There's no point in prolonging this fight... I need to get out first!

Name: Lucia
Text: This "bridge" looks to be made from those remains.

Name: "Shadows" of the Past
Text: Dominik has left, but he was prepared... As expected of our hero.

Name: "Shadows" of the Past
Text: I can only remain. The exit is just below.

Name: "Shadows" of the Past
Text: Keep going, Nemo. If you seek atonement, fulfill your father's final wish... It's what we all hoped for, too.

Name: Lucia
Text: This "bridge" is rejecting me. Hurry across!

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant... Finally, I...!

Name: Yata
Text: The school buildings... sure look miserable. But there is no time to be sad. I gotta find Shiva.

Name: Yata
Text: The Corrupted? Did they all get drawn here when the door was opened?

Name: Yata
Text: The Corrupted are probably gonna swarm up on me if I try to force my way through... I need to be as quiet as I can to make sure Shiva is safe.

Name: Yata
Text: ...Comms is back up? Shiva? Valeria?
Hah.

Name: Yata
Text: Who's that? Stop that and just talk already! Damn it...

Name: Yata
Text: I can hear someone singing... Wait, is this... the song we all sang together at the graduation ceremony?

Name: Yata
Text: The sound of a trumpet... Tsk, nice try trying to fool me here. Bet you're in the broadcasting room.

Name: Yata
Text: Half of this picture is missing. Is this... a group picture of the choir? Seems like someone left it here on purpose.

Name: Yata
Text: It's empty... Guess someone is hiding whatever was inside?

Name: It's familiar.
Text: The missing half of this picture... What exactly are you trying to tell me?

Name: Yata
Text: Seems like the school buildings are back to normal. Guess I can only count on myself now without Valeria around.

Name: "Classmate's" Shadow
Text: Yata, over here.

Name: "Classmate's" Shadow
Text: The rehearsal is about to begin but "she" isn't here yet. Can you help us look for her?

Name: "Classmate's" Shadow
Text: By the way, her classroom might be a little difficult to find. Normally, you'd go up... but hurry down if you run into anything weird.

Name: Yata
Text: So people normally would go up, but they come back down when they run into something weird... Can things get any weirder than they already are?

Name: Yata
Text: Wait, I'm back to where I started. So I'm supposed to go up but come back down if I run into something weird... Did I screw up somewhere?

Name: Yata
Text: Her seat is in the third row of the third column... Wait... isn't this my seat? Which means... I'm the one who's absent?

Name: "Classmate's" Shadow
Text: Great, everyone's here. Let's get started!

Name: "Classmate's" Shadow
Text: C'mon, Yata. All right, look at the camera.

Name: "Classmate's" Shadow
Text: Her classroom might be a little difficult to find. Normally, you'd go up... but hurry down if you run into anything weird.

Name: "Classmate's" Shadow
Text: I hope I don't get dragged by weird people into watching terrible alien movies all afternoon during the school festival this year.

Name: "Classmate's" Shadow
Text: Haha, you mean that senior who's always going on about finding aliens?

Name: "Classmate's" Shadow
Text: Zzz... Huh? Oh, the school festival... Wish there was a napping club... Zzzz...

Name: Yata
Text: No time to waste, let's keep going!

Name: Fallen "Classmate"
Text: Weird... Why am I here?

Name: Fallen "Classmate"
Text: I remember I was moving stuff and passed by the diving club yesterday. I was thirsty so I asked them for some oolong tea... And then...

Name: Fallen "Classmate"
Text: Weird, why can't I remember? Whatever, I'll just sleep a bit more... My head hurts...

Name: "Classmate's" Shadow
Text: It's our final rehearsal! Let's get everyone together for a group photo before we start!

Name: "Classmate's" Shadow
Text: Finally finished cleaning... But wait, this is supposed to be a music classroom. Why are the shelves filled with expensive tea sets and dessert plates?

Name: "Classmate's" Shadow
Text: I found all these weird outfits while cleaning the classroom. Could the seniors have left them behind?

Name: "Classmate's" Shadow
Text: I heard the last club that used this music room always performed in bizarre costumes, but they were super popular!

Name: Yata
Text: Four words seem to be carved into this desk...
Homeland! Of! The! King!

Name: "Classmate's" Shadow
Text: Hey hey, have you heard of the girl ghost in the bathroom? I just passed by that locked bathroom and I swear I heard someone crying!

Name: "Classmate's" Shadow
Text: Oh yeah, I've heard of that. Whenever there's a big school event, you can hear crying coming from that bathroom...

Name: Yata
Text: (Crying from the bathroom? Are these kinds of urban legends still a thing?)

Name: "Classmate's" Shadow
Text: *Sob* *Sob*... What do I do... I can't finish it again... *Sob*...

Name: "Classmate's" Shadow
Text: Huh? Who's out there? Go away!

Name: Yata
Text: (Can't finish... What exactly can't they finish?)

Name: "Classmate's" Shadow
Text: The school festival is coming up, but the event plan still hasn't been finalized... I hope that kid's okay. She's probably hiding somewhere crying again...

Name: "Classmate's" Shadow
Text: Ah, so she's hiding in the bathroom. She's the type who keeps her troubles to herself... Well, this time, let's work together to complete the plan.

Name: Yata
Text: (So the ghost crying in the bathroom... was just because the plan isn't finished...)

Name: "Classmate's" Shadow
Text: The school festival is coming up, but the event plan still hasn't been finalized... I hope that kid's okay. She's probably hiding somewhere crying again...

Name: "Classmate's" Shadow
Text: I can't find her anywhere... Maybe she's already finished the plan?

Name: "Classmate's" Shadow
Text: They're coordinating all the club activities tomorrow though... Do you think she'll make it?

Name: "Classmate's" Shadow
Text: Looks like the school festival will have to be postponed...
Defeat the elite enemy
Aerial Bonus Points
Maintaining Acceleration Bonus Points
200 Combo Bonus Points
300 Combo Bonus Points
400 Combo Bonus Points
Hit 3 enemies simultaneously with the pistol
Hit 3 enemies with Dual Guns' ultimate
Hit an enemy with a Bow from beyond 10 meters
Hit an enemy with a Katana at close quarters
Speed Boost!
Unlimited Firepower!
Battle time extended by 30s
Defeat the enemies!

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant... Commandant...? Can you hear me?

Name: Lucia
Text: ...There was a deviation in our landing coordinates. It took us some time to restore communications.

Name: Ishmael
Text: Lee and Liv were teleported to a different area. I've located their last landing position,

Name: Ishmael
Text: It isn't far from here. They should arrive soon.

Name: Ishmael
Text: However, there will be some... obstacles called "Guardians" along the way. It seems combat is inevitable.

Name: Lucia
Text: Perfect. We can get familiar with the game controls.

Name: Lucia
Text: Well then, Commandant, let's get moving.

Name: Ishmael
Text: If you want to try other weapons, just tap the red button below.

Name: Lucia
Text: This level requires a passcode to proceed. It might take some time to decode it.

Name: Lucia
Text: ...Commandant, there seems to be an NPC over there who wants to talk to you. Her silhouette looks somewhat familiar.

Name: npc
Text: Eek! Have I been spotted?!

Name: Lamia
Text: Don't worry! I-I mean no harm! I just want to work together with you to escape from here!

Name: Lamia
Text: I'll buy you time to decode the passcode. I-In exchange, please don't leave me behind!

Name: Lamia
Text: Phew, they've finally stopped. I'm so glad you're here... Eek! I-I mean, the path ahead is dangerous! You'd better be careful!

Name: Lucia
Text: Commencing the decoding process. Careful, Commandant, they're coming.

Name: Lucia
Text: Progress: 11.27%. The system's resistance is intensifying.

Name: Lucia
Text: Almost there, Commandant. Can you hold on?

Name: Lucia
Text: It's finally done, Commandant. Are you alright?

Name: Passcode Decoding Progress
Text: Passcode Decoding Progress
Floor Zero\nSan Lorenzo Entertainment Park

Name: Lilith
Text: Hahaha! Enjoy your last hurrah, you pathetic fools!

Name: Game Console
Text: Fortune comes rolling in! Will you be the next jackpot winner?

Name: Game Console
Text: Insert tokens, pull the lever, reap fortune! It's just that simple!

Name: Game Console
Text: A clean and beautiful victory!

Name: Game Console
Text: Do you hear that? It's your excited heartbeat, the sound of hitting the jackpot!

Name: Lilith
Text: Looks like some kind of chip...

Name: Super Livestream Machine
Text: Self-diagnosis complete, circuit integrity damaged... restarting... restarting... restart failed...

Name: Super Livestream Machine
Text: Replacement chip detected, repairs complete. Executing command: gratitude dance...
<color=#00FF00>Sugar-free Serum (Refrigerated)</color>
<color=#1E90FF>Ethan Hand Sanitizer</color>
<color=#A020F0>Modern Scroll</color>
<color=#A020F0>Shiny Garbage</color>
<color=#00FF00>Ashless Embers</color>
<color=#1E90FF>Electrified Coin</color>
<color=#A020F0>Stone Mask</color>
<color=#FFA500>Intact Chip</color>

Name: Lilith
Text: Your only purpose is to be kindling, burn to ashes with this city in a bottle!

Name: Lilith
Text: Ugh—ha... ha... that's it, that's it! That feeling... I was right, I am the Ascension-Network's chosen one!

Name: Lilith
Text: The elevator's almost at the top... Is it showtime?!
Game Token
First
You know what, you've actually got a point there
Classic Smooth Mini Combo
I've seen enough, I'm a master at this now
I've lost count of my ranking QAQ
What about trust between robots
That's weird... let me take another look
Kids channel (?Д?)ノ
W＋R＋EA＋R＋QWA
What cutting-edge tech?
Triple the joy ?(`▽?)?
Livestream using AI? Reported (︺︹︺)
It's special effects! They added special effects!
Will you dance with me for a lifetime?
?(?ε? )? Long legs
Ciallo—! (∠·ω< )⌒★
It wasn't that exciting, but I still want to watch it again.
The Composure and Serenity of Veteran Artists

Name: Lilith
Text: How pathetic, my dear Aunt. Your understanding of selection... is so shallow it's laughable!

------>>><color=#FF0000>CRITICAL WARNING</color>
-----------------------------
-----Energy below safety threshold

-----Entering <color=#FF6600>Low Power Dissipation Model</color>

Name: Jetavie
Text: Ugh, stop whining and keep up the output! Don't you dare slack off now!

...
Unlocking...
-----Computing Lock Released
-----Approx. time until total system failure:
...
---<color=#FF0000>180 seconds</color>
---<color=#FF0000>179 seconds</color>
---<color=#FF0000>178 seconds</color>
---...

Name: Jetavie
Text: Huff... Before that happens, I'll fight my own way out.

Name: Jetavie
Text: This space is... the Matrix?

Name: Classmate's Projection
Text: Stay in this safe haven, with us...

Name: Classmate's Projection
Text: Let go of those emotions, and you'll no longer suffer.
Look at you, Jetavie... battered, broken. What's even the point of living in a world without the Chosen One?

Name: Jetavie
Text: ...Not yet. There are still people to save. I need to go back.

Name: Jetavie
Text: The Matrix again? Is this a low-power hallucination...?
Isn't this exactly where you've been wanting to return?

Name: Jetavie
Text: Is that... the beacon up ahead? Looks so silly...
Had enough yet? Still don't know when to quit?

Name: Jetavie
Text: I can't stop now. That beacon... still needs me...

Name: Jetavie
Text: I've bought them enough time... right? Not... the worst way to go down, after all.
You're lying.

Name: Jetavie
Text: Took you long enough.

Name: Jetavie
Text: Before I took my first sip, I made a little bet with myself—"How many pearls will I slurp up before you get here?"

Name: Jetavie
Text: I don't remember. This bubble tea isn't sweet enough to trigger my taste sensors.

Name: Jetavie
Text: Oh, but you know what? Your face was totally saying, "How does such a romantic place exist in this run-down neighborhood?"

Name: Jetavie
Text: You walked straight toward me, while your eyes kept scanning the surroundings...

Name: Jetavie
Text: You were moving slowly, your upper body tense like you were ready to spring into action any second... Heh, my visual module has caught all of it.

Name: Jetavie
Text: Why? Because it's very entertaining to watch.

Name: Jetavie
Text: But you really plan to stay this alert the whole time at a bubble tea place?

Name: Jetavie
Text: That's so you.

Name: Jetavie
Text: Oh? You want to keep me safe?

Name: Jetavie
Text: Your combat ability is pretty impressive as a human, I'll give you that. But still, you can't really compete with a mechanoid, can you?

Name: Jetavie
Text: Always acting so tough... Why not let me protect you for once, hmm?

Name: Jetavie
Text: Look, if I can't get you to relax and enjoy bubble tea with me, then meeting here is pointless.

Name: Jetavie
Text: So, I've already checked every inch of this place and turned over every stone before you got here.

Name: Jetavie
Text: I've swept the whole place—inside, outside, floor to roof. Nothing weird, no interruptions. Not even a fly can get through.

Name: Jetavie
Text: But... are you really okay with this? Dropping your guard so easily... If something does happen here, no one's coming to save you, you know?

Name: Jetavie
Text: Of course. Nothing else can threaten you now... except me.

Name: Jetavie
Text: In this lonely little corner of the world... I'm the ONLY ONE who gets to hurt you.

Name: Jetavie
Text: And yet here you are, waltzing right into the devil's den like a clueless hero who trusted the wrong person. Tell me... aren't you afraid I'll eat you whole?

Name: Jetavie
Text: Oh?
(Jetavie's expression suddenly turns somewhat frightening as she slowly leans in closer, gently sniffing a few times.)

Name: Jetavie
Text: (Sniffs lightly)

Name: Jetavie
Text: (Rawr!)
(Then, she gracefully returns to her seat, watching you with great interest.)

Name: Jetavie
Text: But... I'm dying to know... what could possibly make you this bold?
(She had countless opportunities to harm you, but not only did she refrain from doing so, but she chose to protect you instead.)

Name: Jetavie
Text: Oh? Looks like someone's fallen under my spell...

Name: Jetavie
Text: Hehe, are you guessing how likely I'd throw you under the bus? Too late though—even if you raise your guard, there's no running away now.

Name: Jetavie
Text: You're still way too useful to me. I won't let a single scratch touch you... until I've squeezed out every last drop of your value.

Name: Jetavie
Text: So why don't you just relax and share some bubble tea with me?

Name: Jetavie
Text: By the way, do you know why I picked this place?

Name: Jetavie
Text: This store's dreamy vibe totally makes it the perfect spot to set up a signal source. Who'd suspect such a charming little spot?

Name: Jetavie
Text: But like I said, I've turned this place inside out... and still found nothing. Not a trace of the signal source here.

Name: Jetavie
Text: A nice, bright spot like this makes it much easier to capture all your expressions. Thanks to you, my visual module has collected some really lovely footage.

Name: Jetavie
Text: The lighting here is so romantic. It could even make a serious dummy like you look absolutely dazzling. Do you think this place has magic or something?

Name: Jetavie
Text: You don't think so? To me, just sitting here with you like this... this quiet moment is magical enough by itself.

Name: Jetavie
Text: Right now, staring at this bubble tea... the sounds of battle with the Corrupted just fade away.

Name: Jetavie
Text: This is the magic a simple day like this truly holds for me.

Name: Jetavie
Text: Sigh... I'd love to stay longer, but that signal source won't find itself.

Name: Jetavie
Text: Wait, if I'm right, you didn't tell the old hag that you took us away from Gestrig, did you?

Name: Jetavie
Text: Are you sure it's okay to be lounging around chatting with me... in the very place she forbade you to go?

Name: Jetavie
Text: Sigh.

Name: Jetavie
Text: Hmph...

Name: Jetavie
Text: White mentioned a bubble tea shop in her diary—should be in that alley over there. Let's check it out together when you're free. I'll wait there.

Name: Commandant
Text: ...A shopping mall? Seems like there are still many stores in business here.

Name: Crouching Resident
Text: Bad decision... Shouldn't have drunk so much bubble tea, urgh...

Name: Roadside Resident
Text: Is this some kind of performance art? They've been standing there for hours.

Name: Onlooking Resident
Text: I heard they're imitating some popular band from the Golden Age.

Name: Residents Pointing to the Distance
Text: Still no access to the Inner Ring... Oh well, it's just ruins anyway.

Name: Conversing Resident
Text: Why bother going to those ruins? Didn't the company strictly prohibit it?

Name: Conversing Resident
Text: I... I swear I won't do it again...

Name: Resident with Injured Elbow
Text: My arm hurts... Last night, I somehow got beaten up by someone clinging to a chandelier.

Name: Resident with Injured Elbow
Text: I kindly reminded him not to make a racket in the middle of the night...

Name: Resident with Injured Elbow
Text: They suddenly charged at me, yelling something about a band and calling it stupid. What a bizarre encounter.

Name: Bianca
Text: Cough... This place... It's...

Name: Bianca
Text: ...The aquarium?

Name: Scavenger
Text: Help! Someone... Help...!

Name: Bianca
Text: ...Ah! How is this possible...

Name: Bianca
Text: This is the aquarium, but... how did I end up here? ...Better see what's further in.

Name: Bianca
Text: The Red Tide is... gone? I...

Name: Bianca
Text: That's... me? But why would I be here in the aquarium...

Name: Bianca
Text: Scavengers? Scarlet... Scarlet Revelation... Right, I'm here to rescue the Scarlet Revelation and Chiko...

Name: Scavenger
Text: Salvation... Happiness... Lady Revelationist...

Name: Scavenger
Text: No, it shouldn't be... Keller! It's me! Salvation... shouldn't be like this...

Name: Scavenger
Text: The rescue team... It's the rescue team! Someone! Help! HELP!!

Name: Scavenger
Text: The gate... the whole passage is blown apart! Damn it, we're stuck here! There's no way out!

Name: Purifying Force Member
Text: It's an Ascendant!

Name: Purifying Force Member
Text: CAPTAIN—!!

Name: Bianca
Text: Ugh...
Bianca... Witch...
Come... Eat... Devour...

Name: Bianca
Text: ...Get away from me!

Name: Bianca
Text: That voice... it's coming from there...

Name: Bianca
Text: M.I.N.D... This place is...

Name: Bianca
Text: Did Commandant go in this direction...? This place...

Name: Bianca
Text: These traces... The Phantom Tracer from the airdrop capsule might give me a lead.

Name: Bianca
Text: ...Bloodstains and footprints... all covered by the Red Tide. Commandant was here. But this area's too wide. I need more leads...

Name: Bianca
Text: The monitoring room... Maybe it's still operational?

Name: Bianca
Text: If it is, I might be able to find Commandant's trail from the surveillance feeds.

Name: Bianca
Text: The power's been cut... The Ascendants must be behind this.

Name: Bianca
Text: The aquarium should have backup power devices nearby... I should take a look around.

Name: Bianca
Text: Good thing the Ascendants didn't have time to destroy the backup devices here.

Name: Bianca
Text: Power's back. I need to hurry and find Commandant...

Name: Bianca
Text: ...The Red Tide?! They actually hid such a massive amount of the Red Tide here...

Name: Bianca
Text: This is it. Commandant, hang in there.
Through the Phantom Tracer, you glimpse scattered fragments of images...

Name: Bianca
Text: There are many items here that might still be useful... Found it! The system's backup power source is right here.
A pile of miscellaneous items, already corroded by the Red Tide. They look unusable.
A pile of unwanted equipment and discarded items from the aquarium's previous renovations. The system's backup power is not here. Better look elsewhere.

Name: Bianca
Text: The Phantom Tracer is reacting again!
Figure's Dialogue - 1
Figure's Dialogue - 2

Name: Bianca
Text: The monitoring room is up ahead.
No time to turn back. The monitoring room is just ahead.

Name: Bianca
Text: The way back is completely cut off... Commandant, do we push forward?

Name: Bianca
Text: The collapse is speeding up... We can't hold here. Let's get out first!

Name: Bianca
Text: The exit should be just ahead... Commandant, I'll clear the way, and you handle the enemies behind. Let's push through in one go.

Name: Bianca
Text: Ground's still collapsing... Commandant, this way!

Name: Bianca
Text: Be careful.

Name: Bianca
Text: We're almost there.

Name: Bianca
Text: ...Commandant, this is the exit.

Name: Dolores
Text: Veronica, this time I've brought you a real "treat" of an "opponent"... What do you say? Aren't you pumped?

Name: Veronica
Text: You... Why you?!

Name: Dolores
Text: Heh, is this what you call a "heartfelt reunion"?

Name: Veronica
Text: Serra...

Name: Serra
Text: Target, Veronica, locked.

Name: Veronica
Text: Serra, snap out of it!

Name: Serra
Text: Target... Veronica... Veronica...

Name: Veronica
Text: This is not you! Don't let them control you!

Name: Serra
Text: Veronica... I... ugh...

Name: Veronica
Text: What's going on?

Name: Guard Mechanoid
Text: System, abnormal parameters, disruption... disruption disruption disruption<*!)@*/*

Name: Spectator A
Text: Help! Those metal monsters have all g-gone berserk—

Name: Spectator B
Text: Run for your lives—!

Name: Veronica
Text: I won't let those abominations anywhere near you.

Name: Serra
Text: I... I need to... stop!

Name: Serra
Text: Veronica!

Name: Serra
Text: Hold on... you're not out of this yet...

Name: Serra
Text: Hang in there, we're almost at the maintenance room... just up ahead...

Name: Veronica
Text: Stop slinking around like a scared little rat in the shadows.

Name: Dolores
Text: Veronica, you've finally graced me with your presence.

Name: Dolores
Text: I've been looking forward to this moment for ages.

Name: Veronica
Text: Shut up.

Name: Veronica
Text: Today, we finish this, once and for all.

Name: Veronica
Text: Serra...

Name: Veronica
Text: Where am I? I'm not in that... laboratory anymore?

Name: Veronica
Text: Who's there?!
How pathetic, Veronica. "She" really pulled one over on you, didn't she?
Let me give you a hand. I'll get you out of this place.
Just relax. This won't take long.

Name: Veronica
Text: Who are you?

Name: Veronica
Text: I don't need your pathetic human pity!

Name: Veronica
Text: You honestly think you can stop me?

Name: Veronica
Text: Did my M.I.N.D. just... deviate?

Name: Guard Mechanoid
Text: Target control integrity compromised.

Name: Guard Mechanoid
Text: Intercept. Target attempting escape.

Name: Veronica
Text: Damn it... There are so many of them.

Name: Veronica
Text: My frame seems to be getting... Ugh!
Stop pushing yourself. You won't last much longer.
Leave it to me. I'll help you escape.

Name: Veronica
Text: Shut up! Get out of my M.I.N.D.!

Name: Serra
Text: Veronica, it's me. I'm here to help you.
Veronica, it's me. I'm here to help you.
Veronica, it's me. I'm here to help you.

Name: Veronica
Text: Hah! You can't pull the wool over my eyes with those cheap tricks!

Name: Veronica
Text: If I can just break through here, I'll be able to...

Name: Serra
Text: Wake up, Veronica...

Name: Overseer
Text: Target frame scanned. Threat assessment: high-risk regulatory violator.

Name: Overseer
Text: Counterattack protocols initiated.

Name: Overseer
Text: Optimizing attack trajectory. Initiating full-coverage barrage.

Name: Overseer
Text: Dynamic pathing calculated.

Name: Overseer
Text: Heavy artillery online. Ballistic trajectories locked.

Name: Overseer
Text: Overclock Energy impact detected. Defense threshold breached. Shields failing.

Name: Overseer
Text: Resistance levels just shot up. Rerouting power now.

Name: Overseer
Text: Alert: Energy core output is flagging.

Name: Overseer
Text: Alert! That attack energy just blew past our defense threshold. This is critical!

Name: Overseer
Text: Evaded. Re-calculating trajectory.

Name: Overseer
Text: Ballistics trajectory confirmed. Power output dialed in.

Name: Overseer
Text: Omnidirectional attack array engaging.

Name: Overseer
Text: Impact trajectory confirmed.

Name: Overseer
Text: Overload. Maximum firepower online.

Name: Overseer
Text: Power's draining fast. Switching to backup.

Name: Deloris
Text: Ugh, you're such a pain... Completely useless, aren't you?

Name: Deloris
Text: Kill her... Only then will I truly be happy...

Name: Overseer
Text: Highest priority command detected... Base protocols overriDDen... Forcing all energy modules to overload.

Name: Veronica
Text: You backstabbing traitor, you betrayed your "own kind"! Go straight to hell!

Name: Deloris
Text: I'm a greedy one, Veronica. I don't just want your body... I want your power, your perfection...

Name: Veronica
Text: You and your little mechanical lapdog? You both deserve to die!

Name: Overseer
Text: Energy overload... Emergency self-repair failed... Structural collapse imminent...

Name: Overseer
Text: Self-regulation offline... Disengaging all safety protocols...
Hah, is that all you've got?!

Name: Veronica
Text: Come on, human lapdog, hit me with everything you've got!

Name: Hawked-V
Text: Come on, let them see what I can really do!

Name: Hawked-V
Text: Keep moving, I'll handle this.

Name: Hawked-V
Text: You're still hanging on? It's pointless. Just give up.
A sound comes from nearby, and you sense a familiar presence. It's...
